articles.title: Spain set to approve emergency U.S., Argentina corn buying
articles.description: Spain expects "in the coming hours" to approve emergency purchases of corn from Argentina and the United States for animal feed after supply gaps left by Russia's invasion of Ukraine, Agriculture Minister Luis Planas said on Monday.
articles.content: Spain expects "in the coming hours" to approve emergency purchases of corn from Argentina and the United States for animal feed after supply gaps left by Russia's invasion of Ukraine, Agriculture Minister Luis Planas said on Monday. The country, as a... [784 chars]

articles.title: Spain set to approve emergency U.S., Argentina corn buying
articles.description: MADRID, March 14 (Reuters) - Spain expects "in the coming hours" to approve emergency purchases of corn from Argentina and the United States for animal feed after supply gaps left by Russia's invasion of Ukraine, Agriculture Minister Luis Planas said on Monday.The country, as a major buyer of animal feed corn from Ukraine, was pushing the European Commission to waive import

articles.title: GRAINS-Wheat, corn fall as traders assess Ukraine crisis; soybeans rise

articles.title: Early March rains benefit Argentina but too little too late for far Southern Brazil
articles.description: Drier trends move back into Argentina this week. While much of Brazil is forecast to see wetter trends during the second week of March, drier trends could creep back into southern parts.
articles.content: During the week ending March 12, 2022, rainfall was prevalent across Argentina’s growing region and drought-stricken southern Brazil. The welcomed moisture is likely to help somewhat stabilize Argentina’s later planted corn and soybean crops and coul... [2337 chars]

articles.title: Argentina halts export registration for soy oil, meal
articles.description: Argentina has halted registration of export sales of soy oil and meal, the South American country's government said in a statement on Sunday, drawing swift condemnation from the industry in the world's top exporter of processed soy products.
articles.content:
A trucker drives past a soy plantation affected by a long drought that finally ended this month by the arrival of rain, in a farm in 25 de Mayo, in the outskirts of Buenos Aires, Argentina January 24, 2022. REUTERS/Agustin Marcarian

articles.title: FIH Pro League: Argentina men's team arrives in Bhubaneswar
articles.description: Members of the Argentina men's hockey team arrived on Sunday in Bhubaneswar ahead of the double-header against the hosts India in the FIH Hockey Pro League 2021/22, scheduled to take place on March 19, 20 at the Kalinga Hockey Stadium.

articles.title: Family comes home to Argentina after 22-year drive around the world
articles.description:
Herman and Candelaria Zapp had four kids during their epic journey in a 1928 jalopy that began on Jan 25, 2000.
. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content: GUALEGUAYCHU, ARGENTINA (AFP) - An Argentine family is about to finish the trip of a lifetime: they have covered five continents in a 1928 jalopy on an adventure that began in 2000, while bringing into the world and raising four kids who are now adol... [1896 chars]

articles.title: CBS' Cast Reportedly Includes 'Big Brother', 'Survivor', and 'Amazing Race' Champs
articles.description: 'The Challenge: CBS' cast is reportedly headed to Argentina to start filming. The rumored players are 'Big Brother' and 'Survivor' champs.
